name: Lantern Style
text: Your thrown weapons shine with a divine light that dazzles their targets.
prerequisites: Point-Blank Shot, good or lawful alignment, caster level 1st or monk level 1st.
benefit: Your thrown weapons glow with holy light, illuminating a 20-foot-radius area where they fall for 1 round. A target damaged by one of these weapons becomes dazzled for 1 round.
text_zh: 你投掷出的武器闪烁着神圣的光芒令目标一阵目眩。
prerequisites_zh: 近距射击，守序或善良阵营，施法者等级1或武僧等级1。
benefit_zh: 你投掷出的武器将会发出神圣的光芒，照亮（illuminating）以坠落点为中心的周围半径20尺内的区域1轮。受到这种武器伤害的目标将会目眩一轮。
